title: Transgender actors effective in teaching new doctors to provide respectful care

title_detail.value: Transgender actors effective in teaching new doctors to provide respectful care

summary: By acting out scenarios commonly seen in the clinic, real-life transgender actors can help residents learn to provide more sensitive care to people with a different gender identity than the one they were assigned at birth, outlines a new report.

summary_detail.value: By acting out scenarios commonly seen in the clinic, real-life transgender actors can help residents learn to provide more sensitive care to people with a different gender identity than the one they were assigned at birth, outlines a new report.
